history.narrative: Law 1-58 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 1-193, which was referred to the Committee on Advisory Neighborhood Commissions. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 2, 1975 and December 16, 1975, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 9, 1976, it was assigned Act No. 1-85 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
